Note: Short_name can also be 'map' for mean arterial blood pressure. There's an extra calculation in the R code if 'sbp' and 'dbp' are used.

name_of_value: Partial pressure of oxygen in arterial blood
Partial pressure of carbon dioxide in arterial blood

Note: Can also just be 'gcs' stored as a number. If stored as concept IDs like here, make sure the SQL file called 'gcs_if_stored_as_concept.sql' is accurate
These are all possible options for comorbidites that match the apache conditions
